.b-sch-canvas [data-id='nonworking-2'].title: Non-working time
.b-sch-canvas [data-id='nonworking-2'].content: The gray ranges visualize non-working time. Fetched from projects calendar

.b-toolbar .b-button.title: Display only working time
.b-toolbar .b-button.content: Click to filter non-working time out, for a more compact view
